roleset.name: to exert pressure on someone through threats
roleset.note: BLACKMAIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blackmail' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from blackmail.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: In addition to [*-3] giving a president powers [*]to rewrite spending bills meant [*] to be written [*-1] in Congress , Rep. Edwards argues [0] [*T*-2] , a line-item veto would allow the chief executive to blackmail lawmakers .
